body.p: Connection to the input breakers (Source 1 and Source 2) is made directly to the bus work on the backof the breakers. This bus work is provide with pre-drilled holes for standard two hole lugs that have 1¾"spacing and ½" diameter holes.
Lugs for connection to the bus are provided by others (i.e. The installing Contractor) and should be sized to fit these dimensions..
